page.title: 16PUBLIC SERVICES
page.content: Most houses and factories in{Belper {and District}are connected to the main {gas,electricity and water}supply.Water is supplied by the{Severn_Trent {Regional Water Authority}from the{Lady {Bower Reservoir}in the{Peak District. The electricity is generated at {Willington Power Station.}Gas is natural or{North Sea Gas}piped underground across the country. Belper has a public library and a library mobile van which visits the outlying rural areas e.g. Milford and Hazelwood. Belper has a{Police Station, a Fire {Station and an Ambulance Station. The streets are swept, verges trimmed and refuse collected on a weekly basis All this is paid for from the rates paid to the council by householders and in some cases{Government {subsidies.
